text: An open world is a video game design point. It describes the game as free- form, or allows the player to do quests or jobs with no relation to the plot of the game. Some examples include the Grand Theft Auto games, Arma 3, Dead Space. Fallout 3, Fallout: New Vegas, Fallout 4, Fallout 76, Minecraft, Sonic Forces, Asura's Wrath, and The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, and there is a lot of open world games out there not just these. And they are very popular on Video game consoles, such as the PlayStation 3, the PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, the PlayStation 5, and the Xbox Series X and Series S, and the Nintendo Switch, in fact a lot of people prefer open world video games than any other video games out there!
